query.statement:
SELECT MANDT , DOCNO , DOCKIND , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 1 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS S1IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 2 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS S2IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 3 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS S3IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 4 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS S4IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 5 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS S5IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 6 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS S6IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 1 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS R1IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 2 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS R2IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 3 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS R3IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 4 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS R4IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 5 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS R5IRUM , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 6 THEN VALUE(APIRUM,'') ELSE '' END) AS R6IRUM
, MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 1 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS S1RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 2 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS S2RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 3 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS S3RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 4 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS S4RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 5 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS S5RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 6 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS S6RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 1 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS R1RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 2 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS R2RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 3 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS R3RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 4 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS R4RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 5 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS R5RNK , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 6 THEN VALUE(APRNK,'') ELSE '' END) AS R6RNK
, MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 1 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS S1DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 2 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS S2DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 3 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS S3DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 4 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS S4DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 5 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS S5DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = 6 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS S6DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 1 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS R1DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 2 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS R2DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 3 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS R3DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 4 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS R4DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 5 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS R5DATE , MAX( CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = 6 THEN VALUE(APDATE,'') ELSE '' END) AS R6DATE FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 WHERE MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND DOCKIND = #DOCKIND# GROUP BY MANDT,DOCNO,DOCKIND FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
